desc: In the past 5 years we've helped 10,000+ customers relieve back pain and foot pain with our two flagship foam roller products, the Infinity Roller and the Mini Foot Roller. The Infinity Roller is our peanut-shaped roller and comes in Standard, Soft or Firm densities. The Mini Foot Roller is available in Extra Firm.

layout.text: Avoid injury and recover faster with Infinity Rollers
